    • org.apache.flink.api.common.typeutils中MemorySegment的使用

      参数类型为MemorySegment的org.apache.flink.api.common.typeutils中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      abstract void TypeComparator.putNormalizedKey(T record, MemorySegment target, int offset, int numBytes)
      Writes a normalized key for the given record into the target byte array, starting at the specified position an writing exactly the given number of bytes.

    • org.apache.flink.api.common.typeutils.base中MemorySegment的使用

      参数类型为MemorySegment的org.apache.flink.api.common.typeutils.base中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void BigDecComparator.putNormalizedKey(BigDecimal record, MemorySegment target, int offset, int len)
      Adds a normalized key containing a normalized order of magnitude of the given record. 2 bits determine the sign (negative, zero, positive), 33 bits determine the magnitude.
      void BigIntComparator.putNormalizedKey(BigInteger record, MemorySegment target, int offset, int len)
      Adds a normalized key containing the normalized number of bits and MSBs of the given record. 1 bit determines the sign (negative, zero/positive), 31 bit the bit length of the record.
      void BooleanComparator.putNormalizedKey(Boolean value, MemorySegment target, int offset, int numBytes)

      This class represents a piece of heap memory managed by Flink.

      This class represents a piece of memory managed by Flink.

      Allocates some unpooled memory and creates a new memory segment that represents that memory.

      Allocates some unpooled memory and creates a new memory segment that represents that memory.

      Allocates some unpooled memory and creates a new memory segment that represents that memory.

      Gets the next memory segment.

      Creates a new memory segment that targets the given heap memory region.

      Creates a memory segment that wraps the off-heap memory backing the given ByteBuffer.
